articles.title: Jürgen Klinsmann fired as coach from the South Korean national soccer team - allkpop
articles.description: After facing demands for his resignation following the Asian Cup, Jürgen Klinsmann was dismissed as coach of the South&nbs…
articles.content:
After facing demands for his resignation following the Asian Cup, Jürgen Klinsmann was dismissed as coach of the South Korean national football team after just one year in the role.
This decision wa… [+2227 chars]
